author: Dmytro Gladkyi
summary: wrote a new article concerning the usage of Promise based API from a JS library in ReasonML

author: Guillaume Salles
summary: created Resuggest - a tool to suggest functions in ReasonML based on input/output parameters

author: ReasonML Dojo
summary: will take place on May 27. This is a global event with over 25 locations. You can find all events on meetup.com

author: BuckleScript
summary: BuckleScript 3.1 was released. Significant changes are: Fast Pipes, Js.Boolean is removed and returned back later in a patch, better debug output for ReasonML records

author: Nik Graf
summary: published a ReasonML Course on Egghead.io. It is worth checking out, even if you've written ReasonML before:

author: David Kopal
summary: created a tutorial 'Learn ReasonML by building Tic Tac Toe in React'. This is a nice tutorial that goes beyond your typical MVP Todo List.

author: Zaiste
summary: a new post on hackernoon about ReasonReact: 'Reason in a Nutshell'

author: Lorefnon.tech
summary: a comparison of TypeScript and ReasonML

author: BuckleScript Team
summary: A proposed standard library for BuckleScript: Belt. Still in beta, but folks usually report a very smooth upgrade process, so you can try using it
